thread.title: Venti Group Adds Dave Joyner Associates to its Global Sales Network
thread.title_full: Venti Group Adds Dave Joyner Associates to its Global Sales Network

title: Venti Group Adds Dave Joyner Associates to its Global Sales Network
text: Venti Group Adds Dave Joyner Associates to its Global Sales Network , 1 October 2015 -- Venti Group is pleased to announce the expansion of its Global Sales Network with the addition of Dave Joyner Associates to expand coverage in the USA.Miami Beach, FL, OCT 01, 2015 -- Venti Group is pleased to announce the expansion of its Global Sales Network with the addition of Dave Joyner Associates to expand coverage in the USA. Dave Joyner Associates, of Roswell, GA, a Wireless communications systems specialist firm, has signed an agreement with Venti Group to represent Venti Group’s CORE™ Antennas Product Suite in the Southeast, including Alabama, Florida, Georgia, Kentucky, Mississippi, North Carolina, South Carolina, and Tennessee. Venti Group is a licensor and manufacturer of antenna, coax RF suppression sleeve and PIM technologies. Venti Group develops and owns its patented Wireless technology. The Venti Group Family of CORE™ Antennas includes Indoor Omni MIMO and SISO and Directional Panel Antennas for DAS Networks, Outdoor Directional DAS Antennas, Indoor Omni Wi-Fi Arrays, Directional Wi-Fi Antennas and Small Cell Antenna Solutions. Venti Group also manufactures and licenses H+V Pol Turnkey Solutions for Drones – both for the UAV and Ground Station. For more information about Dave Joyner Associates, please visit http://www.davejoyner.com , contact Bruce Joyner at 770.998.9755 / or Drew Anderson at 678.403.0714 For more information about Venti Group, visit http://www.ventigroup.com or email them at # # #
